title: Bus Tickets sales for multiple vendors
snippet:
Hi I need website to sale bus ticket by trip for multiples vendor 

I need to connect the user with the bus carrier provider 
we need to collect the money and we pay to carrier the ticket cost less at commission sale
we need to generate electronic ticket and electronic reservation for costumer and carrier 

basically I need clone this webpages www.gotobus.com

this website have many services for travel bus just I need for bus ticket sections.

for Hotel, packages and other I don't need .
